name: Cat And The Dark Mystery
description:
Play as a cat who wakes up in the house and soon finds out 
that something is wrong. What happened to her master? 
And what's worse is hiding beneath the surface?
Updates:
Version 1.1 Game Release
Version 1.2 Chapter 2 Update
Version 1.3 Animation Update
Inspirated by: Bendy And The Ink Machine
